text: The countess (kontès in French Guianese Creole) is a small shortbread cake, somewhat sweet, typical of Guianan cuisine. It accompanies a dessert such as fruit sorbets or fruit salads and traditionally uses a fruit juice or champagne. == See also == * Guianan cuisine * Dizé milé * Duckanoo * List of cakes Category:Creole culture Category:Desserts Category:Cakes
title: Countess (cake)
